actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To provide additional flood control storage at the Upper and Lower Baker Dams.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to assume responsibility for operational measures at Upper and Lower Baker Dams, Baker River, Washington, to provide additional storage for flood damage reduction upon determining that such measures are practicable and environmentally acceptable.

titles.title: To provide additional flood control storage at the Upper and Lower Baker Dams.
